content:
After long minutes of touching, pushing, caressing, and eventually punching the various controls, you touch the right combination of “buttons.” The whole panel suddenly ripples, steel flowing and splashing like a vertical pool, before a three dimensional map of the nearby arcology corridors rises up out of the quicksilver substance. You touch more controls, zooming in on a specific part of the map.

RANGERS CHOOSE:

A) If you are at a water location, reroute the flow of water: Discard Flowsteel Controls. Move any number of beings. Then each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.

B) If you are at a ruins location, open a nearby door: Discard Flowsteel Controls. Place 5  on a feature or 3  on the location.

C) If you are at a trail location, access map data from the terminal: Discard Flowsteel Controls. Scout 3 path cards, then each Ranger scouts 2 Ranger cards.

D) If you are at a cave location, illuminate floodlights installed in the area: Discard Flowsteel Controls. Exhaust any number of beings or place 3  on the location.

E) Activate the arcology's artificial weather system: Discard Flowsteel Controls. Return the current weather to the collection and put A Preserved Day into play.
